trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The ProfileEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ProfileEventHandler 委派定義為<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>類別。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application using the `Profile_Personalize` global event, as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>您 ASP.NET 應用程式使用 Global.asax 檔案中的類別`Profile_Personalize`通用的事件，如本主題的範例所示。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件，以指定自訂使用者設定檔。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> parameter specified for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event's ProfileEventHandler is set to a non-null value when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> will use that value for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>中指定的參數<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件的 ProfileEventHandler 設為非 null 值時的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件完成，然後<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>將會使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>該值</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>
